title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath
synopsis: Former Scientology members share detailed accounts of alleged abuse and harassment by the Church in this docuseries from actress Leah Remini.

title: I'm Sorry
synopsis: Life is a series of awkward situations for comedy writer and mom Andrea, thanks to plenty of neuroses and a knack for sticking her foot in her mouth.

title: Forensic Files
synopsis: Detectives and crime lab technicians use the latest and most fascinating procedures to solve crimes in this documentary-style show.

title: Twin Peaks
synopsis: 'Who killed Laura Palmer?' is the question on everyone's lips in a secretive small town, but as an eccentric FBI agent learns, the answer isn't easy.

title: WWII: Lost Films
synopsis: Rare color footage interwoven with firsthand interviews and diary entries bring to life the global sweep of World War II via those who were there.

title: The Great British Baking Show
synopsis: A talented batch of amateur bakers face off in a 10-week competition, whipping up their best dishes in the hopes of being named the U.K.'s best.

title: The Great British Baking Show: Masterclass
synopsis: Hosts Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood leave the tent and go into the kitchen to put their professional spin on baking techniques used in the show.

title: The Great British Baking Show: Holidays
synopsis: Deck the halls with sugar, butter and chocolate as competitors from past seasons bake sweet Yuletide treats for judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith.

title: The Great British Baking Show: The Beginnings
synopsis: A dozen amateur bakers amiably compete for the coveted title of Britain's best as they whip up tasty treats for judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood.

title: The Repair Shop
synopsis: Expert artisans restore timeworn family heirlooms with touching sentimental value while also uncovering their uniquely rich histories.

title: The Gospel of Matthew
synopsis: The Apostle Matthew is highlighted in this word-for-word film adaptation of the former tax collector's Biblical writings about working with Jesus.

title: Forged in Fire
synopsis: Bladesmiths vie for a cash prize by forging the best metal weapons from the pages of history in this competition series featuring expert judges.

title: Stargate SG-1
synopsis: Stargate Command roars into action when Jack O'Neill and his crew find a Stargates map that lets them combat alien maneuvers all across the galaxy.

title: Last Tango in Halifax
synopsis: Two widowed childhood sweethearts fall for each other all over again when they are reunited over the Internet after nearly 60 years.

title: Taxi Driver
synopsis: While looking out for a misguided child prostitute, an unhinged cabbie descends into madness while grappling with society’s moral decline.

title: Penny Dreadful
synopsis: The classic tales of Dracula, Frankenstein, Dorian Gray and more are woven together in this horror series set on the dark streets of Victorian London.

title: The Gospel of Mark
synopsis: See Jesus from a disciple's point of view in this first-ever, word-for-word film adaptation of the Gospel of Mark, lauded for its historical accuracy.

title: John Mulaney: New in Town
synopsis: Stand-up comedian John Mulaney tackles such red-hot topics as quicksand, Motown singers and an elderly man he once met in a bathroom.

title: There Will Be Blood
synopsis: An ambitious prospector strikes it rich and turns a simple village into a boomtown, stoking the ire of a charismatic young preacher.

title: Documentary Now!
synopsis: Elevating the art of parody, this sharply comic series spoofs high-profile documentaries such as 'Grey Gardens' and 'The Thin Blue Line.'

title: Take the Ball, Pass the Ball
synopsis: Through firsthand accounts and analysis, this football documentary details the dominance of FC Barcelona from 2008-2012 under manager Pep Guardiola.

title: The Help
synopsis: A young, white writer stirs up the status quo In 1960s Mississippi by interviewing black housemaids and bringing their stories to the masses.

title: Platoon
synopsis: A naive American soldier's view of the Vietnam War starts to change after he witnesses murder and rape at the hands of his compatriots.

title: Casino Royale
synopsis: Daniel Craig makes his debut as the newly minted agent 007, who's pitted against an infamous financier of global terrorism -- at the poker table.

title: Scooby-Doo!: Mystery Incorporated
synopsis: In this animated update of the cartoon classic, Scooby-Doo, Shaggy and their pals solve spooky mysteries in a hamlet bedeviled by supernatural bedlam.
genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery

title: Zac and Mia
synopsis: Two teenagers with cancer share a connection with each other despite their differences and extraordinary circumstances. Based on A.J. Betts's novel.

title: Dances with Wolves
synopsis: Wounded Civil War soldier John Dunbar tries to commit suicide -- and becomes a hero instead. As a reward, he's sent to the remote Western frontier.

title: Rain Man
synopsis: A fast-talking yuppie is forced to slow down when he meets the brother he never knew he had, an unusually gifted autistic savant named Raymond.

title: The Borgias
synopsis: Follow the lives of the notorious Borgia family, a clan headed by plotting patriarch Rodrigo and his beautiful but treacherous daughter, Lucrezia.

title: Jericho
synopsis: Jake returns to his Kansas town to collect an inheritance, but a nuclear blast cuts off the outside world and makes him a reluctant leader amid chaos.

title: Weeds
synopsis: A suburban mom starts selling pot to her affluent neighbors so she can maintain her comfortable lifestyle after her husband dies suddenly.

title: February
synopsis: When their parents fail to pick them up for winter break, two students stay on at an all-girls boarding school in the company of a terrible presence.

title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
synopsis: A wild teenage boy and his late foster mother's cantankerous husband get lost in the wilderness after social services threatens to take the boy away.

title: Portlandia
synopsis: Fred Armisen and Carrie Brownstein send up the residents of Portland, Ore. Typical targets include artisanal light bulbs and feminist bookstores.

title: NCIS
synopsis: Follow the quirky agents of the NCIS -- the Naval Criminal Investigative Service – as they track down terrorists and other high-profile criminals.

title: The Hateful Eight: Extended Version
synopsis: Trapped at a stagecoach stop as a storm rages outside, two bounty hunters and an outlaw face a gallery of rogues. Features never-before-seen footage.

title: The Pixar Story
synopsis: Go behind the scenes at Pixar Animation Studios with this Emmy-nominated documentary tracing the creation and history of the groundbreaking company.

title: Evil
synopsis: A forensic psychologist partners with a Catholic priest-in-training to investigate miracles and demonic possession in this supernatural drama.

title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
synopsis: In a backwater Iowa town, young Gilbert is torn between taking care of his troubled family and a girl who shows him new possibilities for his life.

title: Quiet Victory: The Charlie Wedemeyer Story
synopsis: When high school football coach Charlie Wedemeyer is diagnosed with Lou Gehrig's disease, he perseveres in leading his team despite becoming disabled.

title: Undefeated
synopsis: An inspirational profile of an inner-city high school football team's valiant effort to reach the school's first-ever playoff game.
Mixing old footage with interviews, this is the story of Arsenal's improbable win versus Liverpool in the final moments of the 1989 championship game.

title: Let It Fall: Los Angeles 1982-1992
synopsis: This documentary chronicles simmering tension and broken trust between L.A.'s black community and police in the decade before the Rodney King riots.

title: The Boulet Brothers Dragula
synopsis: Ten queens must slay the competition and put their fiercest, filthiest faces forward for the chance to be crowned the world's next drag supermonster.

title: Billy on the Street
synopsis: Comedian Billy Eichner sprints through New York with celebrities to stun pedestrians with unapologetic, unfiltered and unique pop culture questions.

title: Enter the Dragon
synopsis: Bruce Lee's final movie is now a certifiable martial arts classic. Lee plays a monk who enters a brutal tournament to which only the best are invited.

title: Madam Secretary
synopsis: When a highly capable woman becomes secretary of state, she struggles to find balance between the demands of world politics and those of her family.

title: The Magicians
synopsis: When grad student Quentin Coldwater enters a college specializing in magic, he learns that the mythic fantasy world he once read about is very real.

title: Silvana Sin Lana
synopsis: When her fugitive husband leaves her homeless and penniless, a once-wealthy woman has no other choice but to join the working class.

title: K-on! the movie
synopsis: The seniors in Sakuragaoka High School's music club live out the graduation trip of their dreams when they celebrate by performing in London.

title: Mike Birbiglia: What I Should Have Said Was Nothing: Tales from My Secret Public Journal
synopsis: Mike Birbiglia performs in this live concert special that features a riotous selection of the unique insights and observations culled from his diary.

title: I Am Divine
synopsis: This captivating documentary explores the life and work of filmmaker John Waters's muse: internationally celebrated drag superstar Divine.

title: All American
synopsis: Culture clashes and brewing rivalries test a teen football player from South Los Angeles when he’s recruited to the Beverly Hills High School team.

title: Senora Acero
synopsis: When her drug-trafficking husband dies, an unassuming woman stakes her own claim in the business in order to care for her gravely ill son.

title: Legacies
synopsis: Born into a rare supernatural bloodline, Hope Mikaelson attends a gifted private school to master her powers and control her innate urges for evil.

title: La Doña
synopsis: Worlds collide and lives shatter when Altagracia, a powerful and elegant businesswoman, plots a ruthless revenge while falling in love.

title: The Gospel of John
synopsis: In the first of four word-for-word film adaptations, Aramaic-speaking actors re-create the stories of Jesus' life from the fourth gospel.

title: Transformer
synopsis: Powerlifter Matt Kroczaleski faced his greatest challenge when he came out as transgender. This documentary captures his transition into a woman.

title: Miracle
synopsis: U.S. hockey coach Herb Brooks unites a motley crew of college athletes and turns them into a force to be reckoned with at the 1980 Winter Olympics.

title: Surviving R. Kelly Part II: The Reckoning
synopsis: As more women come forward with harrowing accusations against R. Kelly, his criminal case gains momentum in this follow-up to the powerful docuseries.

title: Waiting for 'Superman'
synopsis: This dynamic documentary weaves together stories about students, educators and reformers to shed light on America's failing public school system.

title: Sarah's Key
synopsis: Paris, 1942: To protect her brother from the police arresting Jewish families, a young girl hides him away, promising to come back for him.

title: London Spy
synopsis: When his reclusive-banker lover disappears, a hard-partying young British hedonist plunges into the dangerous world of espionage to find the truth.

title: Grizzlies
synopsis: A group of disaffected students form an unlikely bond through the game of lacrosse when a new teacher introduces the sport to their remote Arctic town.

title: Adam: His Song Continues
synopsis: After their child was abducted and murdered, John and Reve Walsh fought to raise national awareness of the problem of missing children.

title: Triumph of the Heart
synopsis: This drama tells the tale of Ricky Bell, a pro running back with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers who died of a muscle disease in the prime of his career.

title: The Ryan White Story
synopsis: After contracting HIV from a tainted blood treatment, teenaged hemophiliac Ryan White is forced to fight for his right to attend public school.

title: Young and Hungry
synopsis: A female food blogger is hired as a personal chef by a young tech tycoon and faces a new menu of challenges, both inside and outside of the kitchen.

title: Wynonna Earp
synopsis: The outcast descendant of lawman Wyatt Earp teams up with an immortal Doc Holliday to rid the world of demonic revenants from the Wild West.
genre: Action, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Thriller, Western

title: The Last Resort
synopsis: In the waning days of the 70s, two young photographers document the Jewish retirees who dominated the sunny shores of South Beach.

title: The Massively Mixed-Up Middle School Mystery
synopsis: After the school principal gets pranked, a curious crew of preteen super sleuths tests their detective skills to solve an underwater ruse.

title: A Bridge Too Far
synopsis: This wartime drama details a pivotal day in 1944 when an Allied task force tried to win World War II by seizing control of key bridges in Holland.

title: Howards End
synopsis: When a husband, acting in his family's 'best interest,' does not accept his wife's deathbed wish, providence dictates that he pay for his duplicity.

title: Supermarket Sweep
synopsis: In this iconic game show, contestants answer food trivia questions then race against the clock while stuffing their carts for massive grocery gains.

title: Ink Master
synopsis: Ten of the country's most skilled tattoo artists compete for $100,000 and the title of Ink Master in this high-stakes elimination competition.

title: Mud
synopsis: Two Mississippi teens meet peculiar drifter Mud and get caught up in his web of tall tales about lost love, crimes of passion and bounty hunters.

title: The 4400
synopsis: 4400 people who vanished over the course of five decades suddenly reappear. None have aged, and slowly it's revealed that they have mysterious powers.

title: 20th Century Women
synopsis: In 1979, single bohemian mom Dorothea, hoping to help her teen son find his place as a man, asks two young women to share their lives with him.

title: In The Dark
synopsis: A blind woman with vices finds herself in the middle of a murder investigation when her best friend turns up dead.

title: Hangar 1: The UFO Files
synopsis: Researchers add context and clarity to UFO mysteries and conspiracy theories as they unpack clues in a trove of files covering decades of sightings.

title: Amandla! A Revolution in Four Part Harmony
synopsis: This documentary recounts the fascinating and little-known role that music has played in the struggle to eradicate apartheid in South Africa.

title: Containment
synopsis: When a ferocious contagion sweeps through Atlanta, authorities impose a precarious quarantine on the city while scrambling to find a cure.

title: Kon-Tiki
synopsis: With five loyal friends in tow, explorer Thor Heyerdal sails a fragile balsa wood raft along an ancient path some 4,300 miles across the Pacific.

title: War Horse
synopsis: During World War I, the bond between a young Englishman and his loyal horse, Joey, is tested when Joey is sold to the cavalry and sent to France.

title: The Croods
synopsis: When an earthquake obliterates their cave, an unworldly prehistoric family is forced to journey through unfamiliar terrain in search of a new home.

title: Greater
synopsis: Faith and determination transform a talentless football player at the University of Arkansas into an All-American in this inspiring true story.

title: Indian Horse
synopsis: Stripped of his heritage at a residential school, an indigenous student finds refuge on the rink when he discovers a passion for hockey.

title: Raising Victor Vargas
synopsis: A suave teen sets his sights on a girl who seems beyond his reach. But his game can't be confined to his tiny apartment and family's old-school values.

title: Metallica Through the Never
synopsis: Veteran heavy metal band Metallica is captured live in this spectacular concert film, highlighted by a staged accident involving a crew member.

title: Total Drama
synopsis: Heartwarming moments are interspersed with backstabbing, scheming, sabotage and broken alliances in this animated spoof of reality show competitions.

title: Charmed
synopsis: After their mother’s tragic death, a trio of sisters bond over their newfound powers, vanquish demons and band together to defend their magical legacy.

title: The One I Love
synopsis: Confronted with the potential end of their marriage, Ethan and Sophie take off for a weekend together, hoping to negotiate their future.

title: The Unknown Known
synopsis: Donald Rumsfeld reviews his long political career, from his time in Congress to serving as secretary of defense under Gerald Ford and George W. Bush.

title: The Muppets
synopsis: When the Muppets learn that their beloved theater is slated for demolition, the gang reunite to raise the $10 million they need to save it.

title: Kill the Irishman
synopsis: This true crime tale charts the rise and fall of mobster Danny Greene, who faced down the Mafia to gain control of organized crime in 1970s Cleveland.

title: The Princess and the Frog
synopsis: In New Orleans during the Jazz Age, a beautiful girl named Tiana has a fateful encounter with frog prince who desperately wants to be human again.
genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical, Romance

title: Jeff Dunham: All Over the Map
synopsis: America's most beloved ventriloquist hits the road, bringing along all of his most popular pals, including Achmed, Peanut and Walter.

title: Rize
synopsis: This documentary explores 'krumping,' a fast-paced urban dance, and follows the man that originated the phenomenon in South Central Los Angeles.

title: Real Steel
synopsis: A struggling fighter-turned-promoter reconnects with his estranged son to convert an old-generation robot into a mighty World Robot Boxing contender.

title: One on One
synopsis: When his ex-wife lands a job abroad, athlete-turned-sportscaster Flex Washington assumes full-time custody of their teenage daughter, Breanna.

title: The Unicorn
synopsis: A widowed father of two girls navigates the world of dating, surprised to learn that many women consider him a hot commodity.

title: My Dead Ex
synopsis: High school teens Charley and Ben find themselves in a complicated romance when Ben dies in a tragic accident but is resurrected by a magical spell.

title: American Honey
synopsis: A teenage girl leaves her dull life in Oklahoma to join a raucous band of travelling magazine sellers on an alcohol-, drug- and sex-filled road trip.

title: Safety Not Guaranteed
synopsis: A team of journalists are sent to find out who's behind a classified ad seeking a companion for time travel, then must decide how to approach him.

title: Unfinished Song
synopsis: With his wife terminally ill, Arthur's future seems grim. But he learns to find joy in life again when he joins an unconventional church choir.

title: Ride Like a Girl
synopsis: The daughter of a horse trainer, an ambitious girl sets her sights on becoming the first female jockey to win the Melbourne Cup. Based on a true story.

title: ParaNorman
synopsis: When an army of zombies invades a small town, it's up to an odd local boy with a knack for communicating with the dead to save the day.
genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Mystery

title: Half & Half
synopsis: After two estranged half-sisters in their twenties find their lives suddenly entwined, they grow closer as they get to know more about each other.

title: Man with a Plan
synopsis: When his wife Andi returns to work, contractor Adam Burns becomes a stay-at-home dad and discovers that parenting is a tougher job than he realized.
